Grid Integration Challenges & Solutions
>
Key Challenges:
> 1. Intermittency: >" Variable power output >" Weather dependency >" Forecasting challenges
>2. Grid Stability: >" Frequency regulation >" Voltage control >" Power quality issues
>3. Infrastructure: >" Transmission capacity >" Geographic mismatch >" Grid modernization
>4. Economic: >" Market integration >" Cost allocation >" Investment requirements
>
Integration Solutions:
> 1. Energy Storage: >" Battery energy storage >" Pumped hydro storage >" Compressed air storage
>2. Smart Grid: >" Advanced forecasting >" Demand response >" Real-time control
>3. Flexible Generation: >" Fast-ramping plants >" Peaking units >" Grid-scale batteries
>4. Grid Enhancement: >" HVDC transmission >" Dynamic line rating >" Virtual power plants
